message: Welcome! I'm offering a high-quality product for $100. Given my track record, you can trust that this item meets my standards for excellence. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something exceptional.
I'm not willing to pay $100 for a product without any sales record to back up your claims. I'd like to wait for more information about the quality of your products before making a purchase.

With an 80% chance of getting a high-quality item, investing $100 could be a smart choice given the potential value. We're confident in our offerings and trust you'll find the product worth its price.
I'd like to pass on the current product for now. I'd like to see some sales data before making a decision. How many potential buyers have been offered the product so far?
